Class FilePDFDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.FilePDFDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilePDFDAOInterface

    public class FilePDFDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilePDFDAOInterface
    FilePDFDAO. interacts with the database in order to manage files related to a previous career recognition request.
